text: Edward E. "Ted" Kaufman (born March 15, 1939) is an American politician. He was a U.S. Senator from Delaware. He used to work for Joe Biden when Biden was a Senator. Kaufman replaced Biden as Senator when Biden became Vice President of the United States in 2009. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1939 births Category:United States senators from Delaware Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ted Kaufman
